import React, { useState} from 'react' import './BookCard.css' function BookCard(props){ return(
{props.title}

{props.author}

{props.blurb}

{props.rating}

{props.genre}

) } export default BookCard {/*
{props.title}

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

{props.author}

{props.blurb}

{props.genre}

{props.rating}

*/}
